plot: This short film speaks on the topic of bullying in schools where our two main characters are a victim. They will try their separate ways to try to fight this phenomenon.
title: Victimes du silence
plot_es: This short film speaks on the topic of bullying in schools where our two main characters are a victim. They will try their separate ways to try to fight this phenomenon.
plot_en: This short film speaks on the topic of bullying in schools where our two main characters are a victim. They will try their separate ways to try to fight this phenomenon.
